title: macOS Monterey 12.3 now available with Universal Control and more
content:
Apple released macOS Monterey (also known as macOS 12) in October of last year, complete with a revamped Safari web browser, improvements for Shortcuts and FaceTime, and much more. However, one of the most-anticipated features — Universal Control — was delayed to a future release. Apple released macOS 12.3 on Monday alongside iOS 15.4, and

The post macOS Monterey 12.3 now available with Universal Control and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple is now rolling out macOS Monterey 12.3, which adds the long-awaited Universal Control feature, as well as other improvements.
